!  I was desperate at this point, thinking I'd blown the game already, but this resource rescued me, allowing me to protect both c3, a1 and a2, while threatening Nc7+, forking K and R and also threatening Rb1 trapping Black's Q.
?? Black should have continued to attack with ...Nb4!, threatening a similar fork on c2.
